Company Optimization Results

Selected Companies (0)

Getting Started:

  • Add companies from the tables below by checking the boxes
  • Select industry charters by clicking charter cells: ○ (only available for selected companies)
  • Use the ➕ column to see how many additional buildings each company would add to your selection
  • Drag and drop companies to reorder them in your selection
  • Deselecting a company automatically clears its charter selection
  • Building count format: base buildings + charter options (e.g., 3.4 = 3 base buildings + 4 charter options, but you can only pick 1 charter per company)

Key:

Prestige Good
●
Base Building
○
Charter Available
